title: Visa extension and change of status approvals
dataVerified: Full name, passport number, current status, new status/extension, approval date, receipt number
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake extension/change approvals. Domain binding verifies USCIS (uscis.gov). Work authorization continuation. Stay compliance verification. I-539/I-129 approval documentation. For privacy, issuers can add a random salt line to raise entropy and defeat guessing attacks.
